# Activities

The BBS Suisse Romande committee

* coordinates BBS Suisse Romande events (typically one each quarter, see the [upcoming](events_upcoming.html)),
* maintains the [BBS Suisse Romande mailing list](https://forms.gle/QZ9FWEJy53GGw2fg7) and [LinkedIn page](https://www.linkedin.com/company/bbs-suisse-romandie),
* organizes monthly community / networking lunches (see the [LinkedIn posts](https://www.linkedin.com/company/bbs-suisse-romandie/posts) for upcoming ones).  



# Committee members


```{r romandie_board, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
## roster   
path <- getwd()
roster_sr <- read_excel("data/roster_romandie.xlsx", na = character())
roster_sr$Name <- paste(roster_sr$First, roster_sr$Last, sep = " ")
roster_sr <- roster_sr |>
  filter(Committee == 1) |>
  arrange(Company, Last, First) |>
  select(Name, Company) 

# roster[is.na(roster)] <- ""
```

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
kable(roster_sr)
```
